response.overview: “Spent some time in a lonely place but I’m only getting clearer. Need some time to be on my own in a world without a mirror…”  We’ve worked harder on these songs than any other record we’ve ever made, and we are so eager to share this new music with you. More announcements coming real soon, pre-save to stay up to date. Y’all get ready.
response.title: A World Without a Mirror
